data: “Dan Rudd,” roared Captain Zachariah Bluntt, “if I has to tell you again to keep that mouth organ below decks, I’ll wring your neck! Yes, wring your neck! By the imps of the sea, I will!”
Wallace, Dillon, 1863-1939; Watson, Hy S. (Henry Summer), 1868-1933 [Illustrator]
